name: Guess the Enigma
description:
Dragoo is under control of the enigmas but this is about to end. Come decipher the enigmas and free them from Dragoo's clutches.

⭐ How to play ⭐

❶ Look at the level enigma, an icon that you will have to decipher to solve the level
❷ At each round, two icons will be presented for you to choose the one that is most related to the level enigma
❸ Collect the bonus when it is presented by tapping only the enigma icons
❹ Dodge Dragoo's attacks by tapping the swords icon

⭐ Features ⭐

🔹 Free game
🔸 Fast-pace match of 30 seconds!
🔹 18 trophies and 3 leaderboards
🔸 3 languages (English, Portuguese (Brazil) and Spanish)
🔹 Independent control for music, sound and vibration
🔸 Tutorial to get you onboard with the game mechanics
🔹 Image sharing
🔸 A lot of attacks including classic games
🔹 6 difficult levels
🔸 100 levels (and growing)
🔹 Store and Rewards Ads

⭐ Follow us ⭐
🔹 Instagram: https://instagram.com/patrike.tessarollo.gamedev
🔸 Webiste: http://patriketessarollo.com
